name: Super Cat Adventure (Kayden R)
description:
A free to play platformer game about getting as many points as possible while avoiding enemies and leaping through challenging platforming levels. The game is small, with 4 levels, 1 boss level, and 1 unique special level as a reward for getting all the points of every level.

This game is for free because all I want is feedback on good things, bad things, and any other kinds of things. Also, if there are any problems with downloading the game, let me know ASAP. Feedback is invaluable because this is one of my first games, so please leave a review after playing.

- Kayden R
